Render Convert Colorspace

Source: R/render_convert_colorspace.R
render_convert_colorspace.Rd

Convert between two RGB spaces via XYZ, with optional white adaptation.

render_convert_colorspace(
  image,
  from_mats = rayimage::acescg_conversion_matrices,
  to_mats = rayimage::srgb_conversion_matrices,
  adapt_white = TRUE,
  from_white = "D60",
  to_white = "D65",
  filename = NULL,
  preview = FALSE
)

Arguments

image

Default NULL. 3-layer RGB/4-layer RGBA array, rayimg, or filename.

from_mats

Default acescg_conversion_matrices. Source RGB to XYZ.

to_mats

Default srgb_mats. Target RGB to XYZ.

adapt_white

Default TRUE. If TRUE, apply Bradford CAT from from_white to to_white.

from_white

Default "D60". Source white name or XYZ (Y=1).

to_white

Default "D65". Target white name or XYZ (Y=1).

filename

Default NULL. Output path.

preview

Default FALSE. If TRUE, display the image.

Value

A rayimg RGBA array.

Contents
